New Records: Liam Livingstone scored 87 runs in his match-winning knock, the highest individual score in the match.
Liam Livingstone played his 50th T20 international match.
Key Match Events: England secured a thrilling three-wicket victory over Australia to level the series 1-1.
Liam Livingstone's 87-run knock was the standout performance of the match.
Travis Head captained Australia but was ultimately dismissed as England won the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Travis Head expressed disappointment after his captaincy ended in defeat.
The series is now levelled at 1-1, with the final match to be played in Manchester.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Sophia Gardens in Cardiff.
The series is a three-match series, with the next game scheduled for Monday, 9th September 2024, in Manchester.
